property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Reveal the top two cards of your library. An opponent chooses one of them. Put that card into your hand and exile the other with a silver counter on it. −1: Put a card you own with a silver counter on it from exile into your hand. −2: Create a 0/0 colorless Construct artifact creature token with "This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shield took a year to craft, a month to enchant, and a decade to master - all for one glorious moment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My flock flew from a distant continent ruined by cataclysm and war. Benalia gave us shelter to end our exodus."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Creatures can't attack you or planeswalkers you control unless their controller pays {1} for each of those creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The walls of Argive were built by a peaceful dynastic union that has guarded us against war for fifteen centuries. The lesson is clear."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Benalish Honor Guard gets +1/+0 for each legendary creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The true measure of all heroes is not what they achieve, but who they inspire." - Triumph of Gerrard

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some aspire to climb the mountain of Honor. The Benalish are born upon its peak, and from there ascend among the stars." - History of Benalia

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enchanted by mage-smiths and blessed by priests, Benalish windows let in light and cast out darkness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a historic card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A new gathering for a new age.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Benalish citizens born under the same constellations share a star-clan. Their loyalty to one another interlaces the Seven Houses.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Honor rides before us. All we have to do is catch up." - Danitha Capashen

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a historic spell, tap target creature an opponent controls. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Go swiftly, clever arrow, and teach The philosophy of stillness." - D'Avenant verse

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, vigilance, lifelink Aura and Equipment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will protect the less fortunate. I will love bravely. I will face despair and fight on. As a Capashen, I can do no less."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Daring Archaeologist enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand. Whenever you cast a historic spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Daring Archaeologist. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Dauntless Bodyguard enters the battlefield, choose another creature you control. Sacrifice Dauntless Bodyguard: The chosen creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Benalish aristocracy is hereditary, but the loyalty of its subjects is earned.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has first strike, and is a Knight in addition to its other types. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink {4}: Exchange your life total with Evra, Halcyon Witness's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Light from the Null Moon took form - a mirage made real, alone in grandeur, isolated in a world that once had been its own." - Fall of the Thran

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} as you cast this spell.) When Excavation Elephant enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I - Destroy all lands. II, III - Each player returns two land cards from their graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gideon's Reproach deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Amonkhet, Gideon lost both his sural and his faith in himself. But he can still throw a punch, and he still knows a bad guy when he sees one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn by a source of your choice. You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whatever faith you have in Serra, she has more in you." - Lyra Dawnbringer

property.name: Rules
property.value: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II - Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance. III - Knights you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let go of all that harms you. Cast your burdens into the darkness, and build for the faithful a house of light." - Song of All, canto 1008

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Hexproof from black (This creature can't be the target of black spells or abilities your opponents control.) Knight of Grace gets +1/+0 as long as any player controls a black permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A light to pierce the shadows.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mage-smiths of New Benalia have perfected the art of blending fine steel and enchanted glass into weapons that are both beautiful and deadly. Only elite knights are entrusted with these martial works of art.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike Creatures you control with first strike have double strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Descendant of a vanished land, student of a forgotten general, and master of blades no smith could forge anew. He honors them all by living a life worthy of song.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike, lifelink Other Angels you control get +1/+1 and have lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You are not alone. You never were."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The unicorns of Sursi are a manifestation of Serra's joy and compassion. They frolic and dance like children, offering blessings to anyone they encounter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature is legendary, gets +1/+1, and has flying, vigilance, and lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The spirit of Serra raised Brindri high and commanded her to keep the balance." - Song of All, canto 524

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Pegasus Courser attacks, another target attacking creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A pegasus chooses its rider, bearing the worthy into the clouds and tossing all others to the ground.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink Discard a historic card: Sanctum Spirit gains indestructible until end of turn. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When history becomes too mournful, even good souls may choose to forget." - Shalai, voice of Plenty

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Seal Away enters the battlefield, exile target tapped creature an opponent controls until Seal Away leaves the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An ancient nemesis rendered harmless long ago.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {2}{W} (You may pay an additional {2}{W} as you cast this spell.) When Sergeant-at-Arms enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Knights get the glory. Soldiers get things done.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The angel remembers her past lives like dreams. Her song held up meadows. Her blade drove back darkness. Her wings carried her across the ages.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike Whenever you cast a historic spell, Serra Disciple gets +1/+1 until end of turn. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Theologians now believe the Ancestor was another divine form of Serra.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying You, planeswalkers you control, and other creatures you control have hexproof. {4}{G}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a historic spell, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Ancestor saved us for a purpose."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Tragic Poet: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In a healing world I write - I, who will never be healed. Let my last gift be one of memory: from a thousand lost thoughts, choose one, and remember my name."

property.name: Rules
property.value: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II - Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control with the greatest power. III - Target creature you control with the greatest power gains flying, first strike, and lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.) Exile all nonland permanents that aren't legendary.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centuries ago, one man's vengeance plunged the world into ice and darkness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) Flying If Academy Drake was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Wizard. When Academy Journeymage enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We don't choose who comes here. We choose how long they stay."

property.name: Rules
property.value: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II - Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. III - Artifacts you control become artifact creatures with base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Tolarian Academies are known for their magical research, powerful sorcerers, and accidental destruction of ecosystems.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a historic spell, scry 1. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic. To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The trick to talking sense into Keldons is getting them to hold still. I learned that from Radha." - Jhoira

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.) Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Cloudreader Sphinx enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For generations, the inhabitants of Orvada have hungered for turtle soup. For generations, the turtles have frustrated their ambitions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant permanent Enchanted permanent has hexproof. When enchanted permanent leaves the battlefield, if it was historic, draw two cards. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 0/4, has defender, loses all other abilities, and is a blue Wall in addition to its other colors and types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For cryomancers, studying the Ice Age isn't just an academic exercise.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a historic spell, target player mills two cards. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Archaeologists don't just dig in the dirt. They excavate time, scraping off the years grain by grain.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Half your studies will be learning the laws of magic. The other half will be bending them." - Naru Meha, master wizard

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Homarid Explorer enters the battlefield, target player mills four cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Homarids spread northward from Sarpadia as the climate cooled, raiding coastal settlements for supplies." - Time of Ice

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant permanent You control enchanted permanent. Enchanted permanent is legendary.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your contract is in default. You belong to me now. Serve, or die." - Nicol Bolas

property.name: Rules
property.value: (You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.) Target player takes an extra turn after this one. Return up to one target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Exile Karn's Temporal Sundering.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centuries ago, a quest to harness time became a spiral into chaos.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Merfolk Trickster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. It loses all abilities until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Saved from destruction by one planeswalker's sacrifice, the Eliterate colony forswore the taking of life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I - Return target instant card from your graveyard to your hand. II - Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. III - Until end of turn, whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a Wizard entering the battlefield under your control causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Naru Meha, Master Wizard enters the battlefield, copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. Other Wizards you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The crystal pulsed with the power of Teferi's planeswalker spark. Had Jhoira given him a blessing or a curse?

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may cast instant and sorcery spells from the top of your library. {3}: Exile the top card of your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Relic Runner can't be blocked if you've cast a historic spell this turn. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her knack for tampering with wards got her kicked out of the academy, but they also got her back in.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With just a few seconds to escape, Deryan saved Hurkyl's editions on restoring physical objects from ash.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though it was laid to waste by the brothers, many schools of magic trace their origins to the College of Lat-Nam, including the first Tolarian Academy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Sentinel of the Pearl Trident enters the battlefield, you may exile target historic permanent you control. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.) When Slinn Voda, the Rising Deep enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return all creatures to their owners' hands except for Merfolk, Krakens, Leviathans, Octopuses, and Serpents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fire spell stuttered and broke. Its pieces reached Teferi out of rhythm, meaningless.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Tempest Djinn gets +1/+0 for each basic Island you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first to arrive on Dominaria from their distant home, the marids are the oldest tribe of djinn and the most respected by storm and sea.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control with power or toughness 1 or less can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My ancestor Toshiro used to say, ‘Life is a series of choices between bad and worse.' I'm a master of making great bad choices."

property.name: Rules
property.value: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II - Tap target creature an opponent controls. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Time of Ice. III - Return all tapped creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Tolarian Academies embrace a tradition of study and research while discouraging the kinds of experiments that ruined the original island of Tolaria.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target noncreature spell. Untap up to three lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A problem is only a problem if you don't have the tools to correct it." - Jhoira

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Vodalian Empire tends to be insular. The scholarly Volshe caste are the exception, using education as an antidote to xenophobia.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards. Target player mills three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In lives that have stretched for centuries, there are bound to be a few awkward silences.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Wizard. Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The second mage learned to dissipate blasts of lightning. Threat and response: thus did the study of magic progress." - Naban, dean of iteration

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may pay {3}{U} and tap an untapped artifact you control rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do as I please, little mortal. Do go on about your wishes, though - they amuse me to no end."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+1 until end of turn. If it's legendary, it also gains lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My heart is not mine, it is Belzenlok's. All hearts are his, and all blood." - "Rite of Belzenlok"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All hail the Demonlord Belzenlok, Evincar of the Stronghold, Scion of Darkness, Doom of Fools, Lord of the Wastes, Master of the Ebon Hand, Eternal Patriarch of the Cabal . . ."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a historic spell, Cabal Paladin deals 2 damage to each opponent. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Demonlord has ruled every age. Every ruin, myth, and nightmare proves his power." - "Rite of Belzenlok"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {3}{B} (You may pay an additional {3}{B} as you cast this spell.) When Caligo Skin-Witch enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, each opponent discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take their faces. The lips of these unbelievers may yet honor the Demonlord."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your life is finished, your name lost, and your work forgotten. It is as though Mazeura never existed." - Chainer's Torment

property.name: Rules
property.value: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II - Chainer's Torment deals 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life. III - Create an X/X black Nightmare Horror creature token, where X is half your life total, rounded up. It deals X damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard. Dark Bargain deals 2 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have pustules of the great Ratadrabik, very cheap. No? Surely you'll want a tincture of Nevinyrral's pulverized remains. Genuine!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Deathbloom Thallid dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature is not always gentle or kind, but all life begets life." - Marwyn of Llanowar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. When enchanted creature dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the Cabal, death is just another mark of devotion.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample When Demonlord Belzenlok enters the battlefield, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card, then put that card into your hand. If the card's mana value is 4 or greater, repeat this process. Demonlord Belzenlok deals 1 damage to you for each card put into your hand this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player reveals their hand. You choose an artifact or creature card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Flittersprites collect unusually valuable things: coins of fallen empires, baby teeth, and memories of treasured names.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Dread Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The forest surrounding the Vess estate became the Caligo Morass, a vast bog stalked by horrors too terrible to name." - "The Fall of the House of Vess"

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}: Tap Drudge Sentinel. It gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Cabal assured the Seven Houses that hostages receive all the food and rest they require.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I - Each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. II - Each opponent discards a card. III - Put target creature or planeswalker card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fear the dark if you must, but don't mistake sunlight for safety." - Josu Vess

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Urborg used to be lovely - scenic volcanoes, respectable lich lords. Since the Cabal came with their nightmares and thrulls, it's all gone to the worms." - Mister Lostspoons, Skulltown gossip

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for two cards. Put one into your hand and the other into your graveyard. Then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sleep now, brother. That is the one gift I can give you." - Liliana Vess

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To thallids, the whole world is just a pile of mulch to grow saprolings in.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {5}{B} (You may pay an additional {5}{B} as you cast this spell.) Menace When Josu Vess, Lich Knight enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create eight 2/2 black Zombie Knight creature tokens with menace.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a creature an opponent controls is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on Kazarov, Sengir Pureblood. {3}{R}: Kazarov deals 2 damage to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Hexproof from white (This creature can't be the target of white spells or abilities your opponents control.) Knight of Malice gets +1/+0 as long as any player controls a white permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A shadow to swallow the light.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof You can't lose the game. Whenever you gain life, draw that many cards. Whenever you lose life, for each 1 life you lost, exile a permanent you control or a card from your hand or graveyard. When Lich's Mastery leaves the battlefield, you lose the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a historic spell, you may pay {B}. If you do, return Lingering Phantom from your graveyard to your hand. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "True power never dies, but lies awake, waiting for its name to be spoken." - The Eldest Reborn

property.name: Rules
property.value: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I - Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. That creature becomes an artifact in addition to its other types. II - Destroy all nonartifact creatures. III - Exile all opponents' graveyards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rat Colony gets +1/+0 for each other Rat you control. A deck can have any number of cards named Rat Colony.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wreckage from the Phyrexian Invasion provided the rats with a seemingly unlimited number of breeding grounds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II - Create two 0/1 black Cleric creature tokens. III - Create a 6/6 black Demon creature token with flying, trample, and "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice another creature. If you can't, this creature deals 6 damage to you."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Put two loyalty counters on a planeswalker you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You bound me with a contract only your death could end - and you thought me the fool?" - Liliana Vess

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first mistake the Grimnant knights made was bullying the owner of an Urborg corpse shop. Their second mistake was dying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.) Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) If Stronghold Confessor was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Thallid Omnivore gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If a Saproling was sacrificed this way, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thelon of Havenwood created thallids as a food source in times of darkness. Thallids did the same with saprolings.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some of the thallids that escaped into the fens of Urborg began emulating the Cabal's bloodsoaked rituals in their own peculiar way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each creature sacrificed this way. When Torgaar, Famine Incarnate enters the battlefield, up to one target player's life total becomes half their starting life total, rounded down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Urgoros, the Empty One deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card at random. If the player can't, you draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the phantom flies overhead, the city of Vhelnish screams in silence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker - Sacrifice a creature. (You may sacrifice a creature in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.) Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice two creatures: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look how they beg for the knife! The Demonlord has trained them well."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Windgrace Acolyte enters the battlefield, mill three cards and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Acolytes of the lost Lord Windgrace fight to keep Urborg relics out of Cabal hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Belzenlok's lieutenant Yar-Kul grew too ambitious, the Demonlord transformed him into a maggot. The frog that ate the maggot grew and grew, until a ravenous spirit burst from its body.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.) Put up to one target creature or planeswalker card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Destroy up to one target creature or planeswalker. Exile Yawgmoth's Vile Offering.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centuries ago, a mad god offered a simple trade.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a spell, if that spell was kicked, Bloodstone Goblin gets +1/+1 and gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The stone whispers tales of darkness and fire. She replies, "Tell me more."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Champion of the Flame gets +2/+2 for each Aura and Equipment attached to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Grand Warlord Radha's challengers are always defeated, but she rewards the most passionate with the Flame of Keld. After that, they burn for her.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike and haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The flame paints a bright wheel on the sky, then shifts into a stabbing spark. The enemy falls; the smoke of victory rises." - "Legends of the Firedancer"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Fiery Intervention deals 5 damage to target creature. • Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Burning something is easy. Choosing a target can be more difficult.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {5}{R} (You may pay an additional {5}{R} as you cast this spell.) Fight with Fire deals 5 damage to target creature. If this spell was kicked, it deals 10 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets instead. (Those targets can include players and planeswalkers.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best way to learn from a book on pyromancy is to burn it." - Jaya Ballard

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Firefist Adept enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to target creature an opponent controls, where X is the number of Wizards you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The versatile "fiery gauntlet" is among the first spells young Ghitu mages learn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I - The First Eruption deals 1 damage to each creature without flying. II - Add {R}{R}. III - Sacrifice a Mountain. If you do, The First Eruption deals 3 damage to each creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I - Discard your hand. II - Draw two cards. III - If a red source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player this turn, it deals that much damage plus 2 to that permanent or player instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The heat in our hearts sometimes rises to the surface." - Valduk, keeper of the Flame

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {3}{R} (You may pay an additional {3}{R} as you cast this spell.) When Ghitu Chronicler enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ghitu Journeymage enters the battlefield, if you control another Wizard, Ghitu Journeymage deals 2 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Ghitu of Shiv are as fierce and uncompromising as their volcanic home.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Ghitu Lavarunner gets +1/+0 and has haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tolarians teach the theory of pyromancy. The Ghitu prefer applied research.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker - Sacrifice an artifact or Goblin. (You may sacrifice an artifact or Goblin in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.) Goblin Barrage deals 4 damage to target creature. If this spell was kicked, it also deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike When Goblin Chainwhirler enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each opponent and each creature and planeswalker they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The trick is, once you get moving, don't stop!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Goblin spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Goblins you control have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not since the days of Pashalik Mons have the Rundvelt goblins been so united or effective.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Haphazard Bombardment enters the battlefield, choose four nonenchantment permanents you don't control and put an aim counter on each of them. At the beginning of your end step, if two or more permanents you don't control have an aim counter on them, destroy one of those permanents at random.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Add {R}{R}{R}. Spend this mana only to cast instant or sorcery spells. [+1]: Discard up to three cards, then draw that many cards. −8: You get an emblem with "You may cast instant and sorcery spells from your graveyard. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead."

property.name: Rules
property.value: (You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.) Jaya's Immolating Inferno deals X damage to each of up to three targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centuries ago, a pyromancer's spark ignited a fiery conflagration.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {3}{R} (You may pay an additional {3}{R} as you cast this spell.) Haste When Keldon Overseer enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Keldon Raider enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keldon raiders' spoils are limited to what their colos can carry. No matter the value, the rest goes up in smoke.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Keldon Warcaller attacks, put a lore counter on target Saga you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Mountain gave the Flame to Kradak to light the furnaces of his people's hearts. The wanderers became Keldons, and he the first warlord." - "The Flame of Keld"

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Orcish Vandal deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every ancient relic is a weapon if you throw it hard enough.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Radiating Lightning deals 3 damage to target player and 1 damage to each creature that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the Cabal legions pushed into Shiv, they learned not to stand so close together.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rampaging Cyclops gets -2/-0 as long as two or more creatures are blocking it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keldon warriors take advantage of the cyclops's inability to focus on more than one thing at a time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keld faced an apocalypse to fulfill a dire prophecy. Now Keldons have nothing left to believe in except themselves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land. Up to two target creatures can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Shiv is a restless land. It heaves ash, bleeds lava, and scabs over in black obsidian." - The First Eruption

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) Shivan Fire deals 2 damage to target creature. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes Shivan dragons toy with their food. Other times they just cook it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Siege-Gang Commander enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens. {1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Deep beneath the ruined continent of Otaria, there's a mine where goblins still work, ignorant of the destruction above.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.) Trample, haste At the beginning of the end step, if Skizzik wasn't kicked, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It skitters across Shiv, each tendril hitting the ground with a sharp snap.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast Squee, the Immortal from your graveyard or from exile.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You gotta be pretty smart to live long as me, but not being able to die helps."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Two-Headed Giant attacks, flip two coins. If both coins come up heads, Two-Headed Giant gains double strike until end of turn. If both coins come up tails, Two-Headed Giant gains menace until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He watches the pass in both directions, and all must pay his toll.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, for each Aura and Equipment attached to Valduk, Keeper of the Flame, create a 3/1 red Elemental creature token with trample and haste. Exile those tokens at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hammer strikes. The Flame awakens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.) Flying When Verix Bladewing enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create Karox Bladewing, a legendary 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, return Warcry Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: War begins with one red ember.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The old ways were for a winter world. We do what's best for us, not for the past. We are Keldons!" - Grand Warlord Radha

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control a Wizard. Wizard's Lightning deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The study of magic began when the first mage taught herself to throw lightning." - Naban, dean of iteration

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every odyssey begins with a single step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control if it's legendary. Then it fights target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Multani's mind grasped for consciousness as rage itself rebuilt his body.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains reach until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Llanowar's boughs are ever ready To unleash an autumn of steel leaves." - "Song of Freyalise"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) If Baloth Gorger was kicked, it enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A baloth only cares about the many things it eats and the few things that eat it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can't bear to see another plane broken before I make my own home whole. I'm sorry, but my watch is over."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Corrosive Ooze blocks or becomes blocked by an equipped creature, destroy all Equipment attached to that creature at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing tastes finer to an ooze than a priceless family heirloom.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {G}. {T}: Add {G}{G}. Spend this mana only to cast kicked spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bond between Llanowar elves and their kavu empowers both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. Sacrifice two Saprolings: You gain 2 life and draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thallids nurture saprolings, entertain them, and eat them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player shuffles up to three target cards from their graveyard into their library. Draw a card. When Gaea's Blessing is put into your graveyard from your library, shuffle your graveyard into your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gaea's Protector must be blocked if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fallen Phyrexians were transmuted into elementals by Gaea long ago, but Yavimaya's other inhabitants still regard them with unease.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. If this spell was kicked, instead search your library for two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.) If Grunn, the Lonely King was kicked, it enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Grunn attacks alone, double its power and toughness until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.) Look at the top X cards of your library. You may put any number of land and/or legendary permanent cards with mana value X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centuries ago, a barbarian laid his rage to rest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {4}{G} (You may pay an additional {4}{G} as you cast this spell.) When Krosan Druid enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, you gain 10 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Druids endure disaster as seeds endure winter. Now Krosa blooms once more."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As patient and generous as life, as harsh and merciless as nature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Cherish this world in honor of the martyrs who saved it. We too must be prepared to give our lives." - The Mending of Dominaria

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Llanowar elfhames occupy different heights within the great forest. Elves of the Loridalh and Kelfae hames can see neither earth nor sky.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most spiders of Llanowar disdain elvish alliances. No elf has as many beautiful eyes or as many strong arms.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another Elf enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Marwyn, the Nurturer. {T}: Add an amount of {G} equal to Marwyn's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Midwife to mothers and leader to all.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II - Mill two cards, then you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand. III - Return all land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield, then shuffle your graveyard into your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach, trample Multani, Yavimaya's Avatar gets +1/+1 for each land you control and each land card in your graveyard. {1}{G}, Return two lands you control to their owner's hand: Return Multani from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As Argoth's last defenders fell to Urza's juggernauts, Titania said, ‘Nature cannot be destroyed, only changed.'" - The Antiquities War

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pierce the Sky deals 7 damage to target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Llanowar elves conceal their ballistae in the upper canopy of the forest, ready to clear the skies of any intruder.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can hear its tail thrashing from a mile away. Keep in mind that its jaws may already be half a mile closer." - Jenson Carthalion, Yavimaya exile

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) Create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens. If this spell was kicked, create four of those tokens instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thallids herd saprolings from place to place in search of detritus to feed them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II - Until your next turn, creatures you control gain "{T}: Add one mana of any color." III - Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance, trample, and indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the irrepressible power of a dormant Multani courses through Yavimaya, the forest passes judgment on travelers and natives alike. Only the fungus prospers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each other creature you control that's a Fungus or Saproling gets +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The identifying ornamental growths of alpha thallids may be hereditary, or catalyzed by some chemical signal." - Sarpadian Empires, vol. III

property.name: Rules
property.value: Steel Leaf Champion can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One eye open to see the truth of the world. One eye covered to gaze at the goddess within.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until your next turn, all lands you control become 2/2 Elemental creatures with reach, indestructible, and haste. They're still lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yavimaya is aware, but not always awake. You will know the difference when you see it." - Karn

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.) When Territorial Allosaurus enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, it fights another target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A living remnant of the Ice Age.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Thorn Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first law of Yavimaya is that guests may kill only to survive. As fires aren't needed in the warm weather, cutting trees for wood means death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.) Vigilance, trample If Untamed Kavu was kicked, it enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bower shuddered. The stillness broke. The scurf shifted, and a being emerged from the flowers and ferns.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. If this spell was kicked, put two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Yavimaya Sapherd enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When their community grows cluttered, thallids begin a traditional bobbing dance, then trek out in all directions." - Sarpadian Empires, vol. III

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Wizards you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The passionate intensity of the Ghitu tempered by the cool insight of Tolarian training.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch, lifelink Other legendary creatures you control get +2/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I won't abandon the Weatherlight. My destiny is to serve at Jhoira's side. This ‘illness' means I must trust my faith more and myself less."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance {2}{W}, {T}: Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance. {B}, {T}, Tap X untapped Knights you control: Destroy target creature with power X or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample, haste If Darigaaz Reincarnated would die, instead exile it with three egg counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Darigaaz is exiled with an egg counter on it, remove an egg counter from it. Then if Darigaaz has no egg counters on it, return it to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Garna, the Bloodflame enters the battlefield, return to your hand all creature cards in your graveyard that were put there from anywhere this turn. Other creatures you control have haste.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Whenever one or more creatures you control attack, add that much mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The future is my gift to Keld."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever you cast a spell, if that spell was kicked, put a +1/+1 counter on Hallar, the Firefletcher, then Hallar deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to each opponent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a historic spell, draw a card. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As she took the wheel of the Weatherlight for the first time in a millennium, Jhoira knew she'd been right to restore the ship. Anything was possible now.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay the mana cost for spells you cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Chronicles across the ages describe Jodah. They likely refer not to one mage, but to a family or an arcane title." - Arkol, Argivian scholar

property.name: Rules
property.value: During each of your turns, you may play a land and cast a permanent spell of each permanent type from your graveyard. (If a card has multiple permanent types, choose one as you play it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My child grew from rot and ruin, yet she bloomed." - Multani

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Oath of Teferi enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent you control. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. You may activate the loyalty abilities of planeswalkers you control twice each turn rather than only once.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For the lost and forgotten, I will keep watch."

property.name: Rules
property.value: (You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.) Return all legendary permanent cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centuries ago, five dragons conquered death to rule the living.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying You may cast historic spells as though they had flash. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rona, Disciple of Gix enters the battlefield, you may exile target historic card from your graveyard. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.) You may cast spells from among cards exiled with Rona. {4}, {T}: Exile the top card of your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shanna, Sisay's Legacy can't be the target of abilities your opponents control. Shanna gets +1/+1 for each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am heir to many treasures. None is as precious as knowing how my ancestor lived her life."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a Saproling you control dies, Slimefoot, the Stowaway deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life. {4}: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Jhoira restored the Weatherlight, a mushroom growing in its hold unexpectedly became her first crew member.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life and draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yavimaya is one being - one vastness of rippling leaves, one deepness of roots, and one chatter of animals - of which I am one part."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Draw a card. At the beginning of the next end step, untap up to two lands. −3: Put target nonland permanent into its owner's library third from the top. −8: You get an emblem with "Whenever you draw a card, exile target permanent an opponent controls."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike Whenever an Aura or Equipment you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may return that card to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An ancient device recovered from a thawing glacier high in the Karplusan mountains.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {2}: Amaranthine Wall gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Neither its appearance nor its temperature varies as the years pass, an eternal testament to the forces that shaped Dominaria.

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: It spilled the blood of one elder dragon. In Gideon's hands, it may yet taste another's.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {6}, {T}, Sacrifice Bloodtallow Candle: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bring me an angel feather, and I will give you one death in return. There can be no turning back once the candle is lit." - Whisper, blood liturgist

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a land is tapped for two or more mana, it produces {C} instead of any other type and amount. Each spell a player casts costs {1} more to cast for each other spell that player has cast this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A Thran relic, it has spent ten thousand years doing absolutely nothing.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {T}: Add three mana of any one color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The perfection of the lotus reminds me of my hopes for this world . . . and my failures. I will not rest until I've atoned for them." - Karn

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Guardians of Koilos enters the battlefield, you may return another target historic permanent you control to its owner's hand. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Archaeologists depend on automatons inspired by their previous discoveries at Koilos to guard the excavations.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a token that's a copy of equipped creature, except the token isn't legendary. That token gains haste. Equip {5}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Forged out of flowstone for the queen of Vesuva.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Howling Golem attacks or blocks, each player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It wails of buried riches and the souls lost seeking them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ice may thaw, but malice never does.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Historic spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You could say it was my pet project." - Jhoira

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +2/+0. As long as it's your turn, equipped creature has first strike. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Juggernaut attacks each combat if able. Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Urza's machines have a splendid habit of excavating themselves." - Rona, disciple of Gix

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a historic spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of Mishra's Self-Replicator. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It has witnessed history's most significant events, one incarnation after another.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color among legendary creatures and planeswalkers you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A moment in time made tangible, it has the power to realize epic visions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Navigator's Compass enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life. {T}: Until end of turn, target land you control becomes the basic land type of your choice in addition to its other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Weatherlight can no longer planeshift, but it can traverse Dominaria with ease.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To the head of Archaeological Findings: The excavation schedule at dig site 93-beta must be revised. Part of the site has walked off." - Tolarian field dispatch

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C} for each artifact you control named Powerstone Shard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Light passing through a powerstone is refracted by eternity and colored by planar energy. I wonder how the world appeared through Urza's eyes?" - Teferi

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a source would deal damage to equipped creature, prevent 2 of that damage. Equip {1}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Benalish glazeplate is stained with salts from the Rift Era and enchanted to deflect blows.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes the only difference between a martyr and a hero is a sword." - Captain Sisay, Memoirs

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Skittering Surveyor enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like a cross between a spider and a spyglass, but friendlier.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. If this creature is a Wizard, it deals 2 damage instead." Equip {3}

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sparring Construct dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The trainers were a gift of gratitude from the wizards of Tolaria West to the knights of New Benalia for their aid during the Talas Incursion.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}, {T}: You may put a historic permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The portal opens not to the past, but from it. Those who step through discover an unimaginable future.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Traxos, Scourge of Kroog enters the battlefield tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever you cast a historic spell, untap Traxos. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Draw a card. Then discard a card unless you exile a historic card from your graveyard. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Truly understanding even one volume can be a life's work." - Naru Meha, master wizard

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, untap target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A missing piece in search of a puzzle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Weatherlight deals combat damage to a player, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a historic card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.) Crew 3

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {3}, {T}: Add {B} for each basic Swamp you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The seat of Belzenlok's power, the Stronghold serves as the gathering place for the Cabal as their dark influence spreads from Urborg.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Clifftop Retreat enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Plains. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sunlight falls pristine on the temple at Epityr, softened by the remembered shadows of angelic saviors' wings.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hinterland Harbor enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or an Island. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our ancestors brought down a Phyrexian portal ship, then built our town on its hull. We're pretty proud of that." - Alene of Riverspan

property.name: Rules
property.value: Isolated Chapel enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or a Swamp. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Serra's blessing lies strongest upon Sursi, where her holy chapels are untouched even as the Cabal encroaches.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Memorial to Folly enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}. {2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Memorial to Folly: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Memorial to Genius enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}. {4}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Memorial to Genius: Draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Memorial to Glory enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}. {3}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Memorial to Glory: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Memorial to Unity enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. {2}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Memorial to Unity: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Memorial to War enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}. {4}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Memorial to War: Destroy target land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sulfur Falls enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Mountain. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have inherited the mysteries of the Thran, but few of the answers." - Jhoira

property.name: Rules
property.value: Woodland Cemetery enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Forest. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They never found the body of young Josu, or that of his murderous sister." - "The Fall of the House of Vess"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Zhalfirin Void enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The wind whispers, ‘come home,' but I cannot." - Teferi

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Untap up to one target artifact or creature. −3: You gain 2 life and draw two cards. −9: Take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand. If you control an artifact, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Cabal soldier blinked and found day had become night, he had a face full of thistle seeds, and the old man was nowhere to be seen.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Niambi, Faithful Healer enters the battlefield, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Teferi, Timebender, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My father will be happy to see you."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control a Teferi planeswalker, Teferi's Sentinel gets +4/+0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Long ago, I enchanted an army of statues to guard Zhalfir. My homeland is gone, but its protectors remain." - Teferi

property.name: Rules
property.value: Meandering River enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everywhere you look, this world is healing from its wounds. Aren't you ready to do the same?" - Jhoira, to Teferi

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Add {R}{R}. Chandra, Bold Pyromancer deals 2 damage to target player. −3: Chandra, Bold Pyromancer deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. −7: Chandra, Bold Pyromancer deals 10 damage to target player and each creature and planeswalker they control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chandra's Outburst deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker. Search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Chandra, Bold Pyromancer, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Karplusan Hound attacks, if you control a Chandra planeswalker, this creature deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't worry, they don't bite. They much prefer setting people on fire." - Jaya Ballard, to Chandra

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From the volcanoes of Shiv to the Balduvian steppes, I have sought a worthy teacher. At last, I have found one."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Timber Gorge enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Glaciers, torrential floods, and temporal disturbances came and went. The mountains yet stood, unchanged.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Red instant and sorcery spells you control have lifelink. Whenever a white instant or sorcery spell causes you to gain life, Firesong and Sunspeaker deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The peaks of Hurloon never fall silent.
